mapper.select: select id, resume_id,user_id, file_address, file_type, type, deleted from t_resume_file where resume_id = #{resumeId} and type=#{type} and deleted='0'
mapper.insert: insert into t_resume_file (resume_id,user_id, file_address, file_type, type, deleted) VALUES (#{resumeId},#{userId},#{fileAddress},#{fileType},#{type},#{deleted})
